Sentencas: The successful microwave sintering of zirconia demonstrates the necessity to understand both the materials and electromagnetic field aspects of microwave processing.
Titulo: MICROWAVE SINTERING OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS .1. ZIRCONIA-8 MOL-PERCENT YTTRIA

Sentencas: It was difficult to produce crack-free parts in the multimode microwave furnace employed in this investigation.
Titulo: MICROWAVE SINTERING OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS .1. ZIRCONIA-8 MOL-PERCENT YTTRIA

Sentencas: Nonuniformities in the microwave field, and dielectric properties that increased rapidly with temperature, produced hot spots in the parts, which led to differential sintering and subsequent cracking.
Titulo: MICROWAVE SINTERING OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS .1. ZIRCONIA-8 MOL-PERCENT YTTRIA

Sentencas: To produce crack-free sintered parts, an indirect heating method was developed that eliminated the severe differential heating.
Titulo: MICROWAVE SINTERING OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS .1. ZIRCONIA-8 MOL-PERCENT YTTRIA

Sentencas: Using this indirect heating method, it was demonstrated that the sintering temperature of zirconia could be lowered from 1375-degrees to 1200-degrees-C by microwave processing and that the resulting grain size was finger.
Titulo: MICROWAVE SINTERING OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL MATERIALS .1. ZIRCONIA-8 MOL-PERCENT YTTRIA
